original_title: Rizin World Grand Prix 2017: Opening Round - Part 2
overview: Rizin World Grand Prix 2017: Opening Round - Part 2 was a mixed martial arts event held by the Rizin Fighting Federation on October 15, 2017 at the Marine Messe Fukuoka in Fukuoka, Japan.
title: Rizin World Grand Prix 2017: Opening Round - Part 2
